summary: This is just a single .esp version of pnkrd's Crown Helmets mod made with permission.
descriptionHtml:
[center][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrimspecialedition/mods/8202/?][color=#0066cc][size=5][u]SSE Version Available Here[/u][/size][/color][/url][/center]


This is a single .esp version of Crown Helmets by pnkrd made with permissions.

Installation: Drag the CraftableCrownHelmets.esp into your data folder and check itÂ in the mod manager or launcher data files.

NOTE: This does require pnkrd's original mod for the meshes as it is only the combined .esp file. Download the All in One file on pnkrd's page at http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/5803 and install only the meshes folder.
DO NOT INSTALL PNKRD'S .ESP's!! [It's called Crown Helmets_AIO_2_5A]

This will work with any texture replacers for Daedric, Glass, Dragon Plate, Dragonscale, Elven and Ebony helmets.

Also I have, at my husband's request, enabled these to work on all beast races. There is some clipping but they actually, in our opinions, look neat.

Anyway, enjoy. ^_^



Changing from many to one:
Unfortunately this is going to require you to do a clean save (I'm sorry but there is no way around it and I know this means you'll likely lose some nifty enchanted legendary crown, I did, but this is the only way.)

Clean Save: 1)Drop all crown's from inventory (and followers if they are using them just to be safe)
2)Save game
3)Quit and disable pnkrd's .esp's (there are 6 in all)
4)Reload character and save again, then quit (I'm told quitting to desktop makes sure that each save is as clean as possible)
5)Repeat for all character saves
6)Enable CraftableCrownHelmets.esp
7)Launch game again and remake nifty crown you lost (Again, so sorry about that!)


Uninstallation: 1)Drop all crown's from inventory (and followers if they are using them just to be safe)
2)Save game
3)Quit and disable CraftableCrownHelmets.esp
4)Reload character and save again, then quit (I'm told quitting to desktop makes sure that each save is as clean as possible)
5)Repeat for all character saves

Delete CraftableCrownHelmets.esp and the following meshes:

meshes/armor/daedric/daedriccrownf_0.nif
meshes/armor/daedric/daedriccrownf_1.nif
meshes/armor/daedric/daedriccrownm_0.nif
meshes/armor/daedric/daedriccrownm_1.nif

meshes/armor/dragonbone/dragonbonecrownf_0.nif
meshes/armor/dragonbone/dragonbonecrownf_1.nif
meshes/armor/dragonbone/dragonbonecrownm_0.nif
meshes/armor/dragonbone/dragonbonecrownm_1.nif

meshes/armor/dragonscale/dragonscalecrownf.nif
meshes/armor/dragonscale/dragonscalecrownm_0.nif
meshes/armor/dragonscale/dragonscalecrownm_1.nif

meshes/armor/ebony/f/crown_0.nif
meshes/armor/ebony/f/crown_1.nif
meshes/armor/ebony/m/crown_0.nif
meshes/armor/ebony/m/crown_1.nif

meshes/armor/elven/f/crown_0.nif
meshes/armor/elven/f/crown_1.nif
meshes/armor/elven/m/crownM_0.nif
meshes/armor/elven/m/crownM_1.nif

meshes/armor/glass/f/crown_0.nif
meshes/armor/glass/f/crown_1.nif
meshes/armor/glass/m/crown_0.nif
meshes/armor/glass/m/crown_1.nif

Thanks and enjoy and don't forget to endorse pnkrd's mod as it is the original it deserves the credit! I just compiled his wonderful work since I love them all!

Cyrusfyre/Seidon

Permissions
I was given permission to upload this by pnkrd and as such any uses of the materials herein are subject to his consent. This mod should not be uploaded anywhere else unless he says it is okay and then credit to both of us should be given, please and thank you. ^_^

Credits
pnkrd for his wonderful Crown Helmets mod http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/5803 which is required for this to work.
My husband for putting up with all my messing with his games and for helping me test things out. ^_^
Bethesda for making Skyrim.
